text: Merrill Cook (born May 6, 1946 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) is an American businessman and politician of the Republican Party. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Utah from 1997 to 2001. Cook studied at the University of Utah and at Harvard University. He is a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Businesspeople from Utah Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Merrill Cook
